{
  "task_id": "RES-01",
  "summary": "filters/select/list URL handling has reliability risks around URL parsing strictness, host validation permissiveness, and unvalidated select field composition that can cause false rejects or malformed Graph queries.",
  "findings": [
    {
      "title": "List URL parser depends on exact-case \"Lists\" segment",
      "severity": "medium",
      "impact": "Valid SharePoint URLs with different casing (for example `/lists/`) can be rejected, causing avoidable request failures."
    },
    {
      "title": "SharePoint host check uses substring match",
      "severity": "medium",
      "impact": "Non-SharePoint domains containing `sharepoint.com` as a substring can pass validation, increasing risk of downstream resolution/request failures."
    },
    {
      "title": "select fields are concatenated without validation/escaping",
      "severity": "high",
      "impact": "Invalid or malformed field names can produce broken `$expand` expressions and unstable list/read behavior at runtime."
    }
  ],
  "evidence": [
    {
      "path": "app/sharepoint_list/internal/validators.py",
      "quote": "lists_idx = path_parts.index(\"Lists\")",
      "why_it_matters": "Parsing requires exact token `Lists`; no normalization is applied before lookup."
    },
    {
      "path": "tests/sharepoint_list/test_validators_list_url.py",
      "quote": "\"https://contoso.sharepoint.com/sites/demo/Lists/MyList/AllItems.aspx\"",
      "why_it_matters": "Tests cover only `Lists` uppercase form, so case-variation reliability is unverified."
    },
    {
      "path": "app/sharepoint_list/internal/validators.py",
      "quote": "if \"sharepoint.com\" not in parsed.netloc:",
      "why_it_matters": "Host validation is substring-based, not strict domain boundary validation."
    },
    {
      "path": "app/sharepoint_list/internal/request_builders.py",
      "quote": "select_clause = \",\".join(select_fields)",
      "why_it_matters": "Field names are directly joined into OData expression without sanitization/validation."
    },
    {
      "path": "app/sharepoint_list/internal/request_builders.py",
      "quote": "expand = f\"fields($select={select_clause})\"",
      "why_it_matters": "Any malformed `select_clause` propagates directly into request parameters."
    }
  ],
  "recommendations": [
    "Normalize path segment matching for list URL parsing (case-insensitive handling for `Lists`).",
    "Replace substring host checks with strict SharePoint domain validation rules.",
    "Validate `select_fields` against an allowed identifier pattern and reject/escape invalid tokens before building `$expand`."
  ],
